name: CRITICAL CARE
description: The department of Critical Care consists of 77 beds along with a high dependency unit. The team comprises of Chief Intensivists, Junior Intensivists, Senior & Junior Doctors and highly efficient, experienced and well trained nursing & paramedical staff.
